attributes.action: have a referendum of the English electorate, before a final decision is made on any future road pricing scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the Transport Minister's webchat, I continually tried to ask the question, "will any future Road Pricing Scheme be first put to a referendum" - I never got an answer.

The people of Edinburgh were given this opportunity and rejected road pricing by 3 to 1. Likewise, this is an issue of public importance and should be submitted to a direct public vote or referendum, by the English electorate, before any final decision is made.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions on this theme already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
